q: The judge said:`` However pressing the economic problems, there was no overriding public interest which precluded consultation or justifies the lack of any consultation.'' Mr Michael Gove 's decision-making process was also unlawful because of his failure to discharge relevant statutory equality duties under the Sex Discrimination Act, Race Relations Act and Disability Discrimination Act. who has led Google for a decade, will become executive chairman focusing on external relations, deals and government relations.New Yorker writer Ken Auletta , who has written a book on the company, reported Friday that Eric Schmidt had been nudged aside.`` Ken Auletta said that after losing out to Page and co-founder Sergey Brin over the company's China policy a year ago,`` Eric Schmidt lost some energy and focus.`` Eric Schmidt was also criticized for allowing Google to be overtaKen Auletta by Facebook, for the company's increasingly frequent privacy scandals and its increasing internal bureaucracy. Together with the co- founders, he decided to step aside.In announcing the move Thursday, Eric Schmidt said that the company no longer needed his`` adult supervision and that Page, 38, was ready to run the world's leading internet company.`` We have been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time,

The computer scientist was Google's founding CEO before handing the reins to Mr. Eric Schmidt in August 2001.''-- Eric Schmidt 's`` An update from the Chairman,'' on The Official Google Blog: Sergey Brin has decided to devote his time and energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products. His title will be Co-Founder.... I will focus wherever I can add the greatest value: externally, on the deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership that are increasingly important given Google's global reach. target="_blank" href="http://bit.ly/fAMu1H"> http://bit.ly/fAMu1H--@Eric SchmidtEric Schmidt:`` Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed!...
